models.game

类 GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • models.game.GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.util.Observable
    class GameState to store and pass the current state of the game
    版本:
    3.0
    作者:
    Lin Li, Parisa khazaei
